Google Payment API 

-Add dependencies
at the build.gradle file we should add dependencies to setup google play services 
-Modify your Manifest To enable Pay with Google we need to add some metadata like this link https://developers.google.com/payments/setup 
Then we should integrate application with the Google Payment API 
Step 1: Create PaymentsClient instance 
Step 2: Call isReadyToPay API 
Step 3: Create PaymentDataRequest object 
Step 4: Create OnClickListener object 
Step 5: Handle the PaymentData response object 
Step 6: Refer to your payment processor
